answers.answer: When they put a medicine through an IV and it forces your body into labor. Its basically inducing labor.

They use this medicine called pitocin to start the contractions for you. When they induced me they also put this balloon thing up my vagina to dialate me to a three. Not sure if thats part of the induction process though or not (i had severe preeclampsia so i was bed stricken and had a cathedar put in lol)
It's different ways tu be induced I was induced by havin 2 small pills the size of mini m&ms put in threw my vagina

They just put me on iv n meds threw it had to break my water which kinda hurt is like a stick thing they put up n u to break it made my labor go fast only took like 6 hrs til I had to push then only half hr til my daughter came. I didn't mind being induced but I've read alot of ppl don't like it I m trying for a second baby n wouldn't mind being induced again honestly

question: Im a new mommy to be and due this 8th my doc said if shes not here by the 11th ill need a induction ladies what is it
title: what a induction
